snippet: Mexico’s Luis Montes and Italy’s Riccardo Montolivo both sustained broken legs on Saturday in tuneup matches and will miss the tournament in Brazil.
abstract: Soccer Roundup; Riccardo Montolivo, key midfielder for Italy, breaks his left tibia during an exhibition game and will miss 2014 World Cup; other news noted.
lead_paragraph: Mexico’s Luis Montes and Italy’s Riccardo Montolivo both sustained broken legs on Saturday in tuneup matches and will miss the tournament in Brazil.

headline.main: Italy and Mexico Lose Players for World Cup
headline.print_headline: Italy and Mexico Lose Players for World Cup
